sentences.sContent: Indeed, the Beijing Olympics could be one of the most financially successful games in terms of revenue receipts.
sentences.sContent_eng: Indeed, the Beijing Olympics could be one of the most financially successful games in terms of revenue receipts.
sentences.sCn: 事实上，根据其岁入，北京奥运会有可能成为财政上最为成功的一届奥运会。

sentences.sContent: Plan to do things that physically challenge you and you will impress someone who is able to keep up with you physically, emotionally and financially.
sentences.sContent_eng: Plan to do things that physically challenge you and you will impress someone who is able to keep up with you physically, emotionally and financially.
sentences.sCn: 计划做一些带来身体挑战的运动，给有能力在身体上、精神上和财政上跟随你的她/他留下一个好印象。

words.tran: 筹措资金；财政管理；从事金融活动（finance的ing形式）
欺骗；从事欺骗性金融活动
